评论详情: This is a unique shirt. It has a fun vibe with the gold paisley design, and even though it looks somewhat lustrous from afar, it’s actually more subdued in person, which I like. It has a snappy appearance, stylish and even refined in a way, but at the same time, it looks a little less than professional. The fit is good, true to size, and overall, I like it. The collar and cuffs are especially nice, and the material has a versatile feel and washes well. A bit pricey.

This can be many things.... baller for a party, a Versace dupe, a nice touch under a suit, tied at the waste (I'm female)... I gave it a 4 star because there's not as much give/stretch as i was hoping for so it's tight around the boobs but still looks good with a camisole underneath and "that" button left open.  Nice weight fabric, washes well, and my friends want my shirt.

I needed this for a film project that required a unique costume, and this was a part of the wardrobe. Somehow I received a much larger size than ordered and needed, but it worked out for the project. The shirt has the brand on the back, and it obviously is “inspired” by a brand that I love and buy often - Versace. I am so surprised that this would be placed across the back, but it worked well for a comedy costume.  I am sure the other shirts from this brand look fashionable, and they do have a nice variety to choose from!
Perfect fit and very nice packing.

评论详情: We bought this shirt for a black and white formal dinner.  It's also great for any evening outdoor party or upscale  restaurant or lounge inside or out anywhere throughout Hawaii  or mainland coasts.
It’s look really good on my husband

True to size and fits like the listing shows! My one gripe is the words on the back of the shirt make it look cheap. So if they redesign this top it would sell better without the lettering on the back

This silk shirt is well made and very stylish. The color are vibrant and the fabric feels thicker than I expected!  It runs a tiny bit small, so i would suggest ordering up a size. Beautiful shirt for the price point!

the texture of the shirt feels fairly nice and the sizing is accurate. I probably would have been more impressed with a solid color shirt as opposed to the poorly printed one that i have. You can look at the shirt and see the separation in the print which really makes the shirt look cheap. This will probably become an item that I just use in my photography studio because i can always make it look better with photoshop.

评论概述: Stylish and comfortable all day wear
评论详情: I wore the gold multi-colored 30 design, and it’s an a standout piece! It reminds me of something from an elegant Arab gold palace, and I’ve received so many compliments while wearing it. The fit is true to size, and the material is both comfortable and breathable, making it perfect for all day wear. The design glimmers beautifully, and the craftsmanship feels high quality. This shirt is bold, unique, and a great conversation starter with anyone. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to up their outfit game with a touch of luxury!

评论概述: The slim fit is flattering, and while some reviews mentioned sizing issues
评论详情: I recently purchased the Men's Luxury Brand Printed Silk Like Satin Button Down Dress Shirt, and I couldn't be happier! This shirt is perfect for parties and proms, featuring a stunning floral design that really stands out. The slim fit is flattering, and while some reviews mentioned sizing issues, I found it to fit well overall. The silk-like satin fabric feels luxurious against the skin and adds a touch of elegance to any outfit. I wore it to a nightclub event, and it was a hit! If you're looking for a stylish shirt that combines comfort and flair, I highly recommend this one for your next special occasion!
This is a beautiful shirt. It has a nice feel to the fabric and a beautiful color. It would be good for a holiday or a party. My husband liked it. A good purchase.
The quality is top-notch, fitting is perfect. I have always bought shirts from this seller and never had an issue with size, quality or shipping.  I recommend this seller.

评论概述: Never knew I needed a satin shirt so much.
评论详情: I wear this casually around the house all the time and I love it. It seems pretty well made, and the fabric is really nice on the skin— no irritation at all. I’ll update on how long the colors and texture lasts after washing.  Fits like normal sizes.  I had thought the pattern would be cheesy in person but it’s better than expected. It definitely looks printed out, but from a bit of a distance you wouldn’t know.  I’ll upload pictures later as well.

The quality of the shirt and the variance of the shirt is just amazing!! It soft as silk thick as cotton and feels so soft when you wear it! Man this shirt is amazing!  The quality of the shirt is extremely good from the buttons to the sleeves, it has so much attention to detail and it has such an amazing feel to it. I love it!  I was really impressed by the shirts quality and i mean very impressed by the quality and the price of the shirt! It is just amazing!

评论概述: This shirt got rave reviews at my NYE party.  Can't roll up the sleeves (looks bad)
评论详情: I wore this shirt for a New Years Eve party and basically everyone who walked through the door immediately commented on my shirt. People loved it.  Fit is great. I'm 6', 175 lbs (tall/slim) and the medium worked well for me.  The only thing I don't like about this shirt is you can't roll up the sleeves. The interior of the shirt is a blank whitish/gray color so if you roll up the sleeves, that horrible color contrasts with the bright colors of the shirt, and it looks bad.  Still, this shirt will get the attention of the ladies and the jealousy of the men who are not bold enough to wear it.

评论概述: Great Shirt with dress slacks or jeans
评论详情: My husband loves shirts that are out of the ordinary. When I saw this shirt I knew he would just love it. When I received it and opened the package I was in all of the beautiful fabric and workmanship of the shirt. Just an FYI the fabric is thin and delicate. This shirt will be elegant worn with either dress slacks or a casual pair of jeans. I chose this shirt to give him for the holiday season. I can’t wait until he opens it up I just know he will be just as delighted as I am with the design and tailoring of the shirt.

It took a while to arrive but I wasn't disappointed with this shirt. It looks exactly like it does in the pictures, which I was honestly worried about at first. There were no noticeable issues right out of the packaging, and it feels comfortable to wear. If I had to find any con at all, the black shirt has some nonsensical ad-like print, but that isn't present on all shirts.
Looks very nice as arrived. I'll wait to see how it looks after carefully washed.
Fit very comfortable for my husband. This is a 3xl quality is omg flattering colors are very vibrant and bold.

I wore this short to a Thanksgiving party and everyone loved it. It's loud, but then people look at it and wonder if it's some actually valuable branded shirt. I'm 5'10" and 160lb and the medium fit fine. The quality seems good.
The material is loose but fits very nicely. Gives off a luxurious look and feeling when having a night out. Love the quality would recommend as a stable piece for layering.
This is a very stylish, comfortable dress shirt. Its cool and the fabric is very, very soft. Great looking shirt!  Damon M. Tatem

This is a very nice satin button down. It is made well and true to size. Washes well with no issues. I love the style and look. Is perfect for a day at the office or out for the night. I am very pleased with quality.

This men’s luxury brand printed silk-like satin button-down dress shirt is a showstopper. Perfect for parties, proms, or any special occasion, it combines a slim fit with a stunning floral design that exudes elegance and style. The fabric feels incredibly smooth and comfortable, making it a joy to wear all night long. The attention to detail and quality craftsmanship are evident, making this shirt a must-have for anyone looking to make a bold fashion statement. Highly recommended!

评论概述: Very silky, looks just like the pic
评论详情: My shirt looks just like the photo, but it feels very silky and soft. Definitely stands out from the crowd! It's not too rough on the inside, and the buttons were sewn on just fine. Nothing much to say other than it looks snappy!

评论概述: Extremely soft, with nonsense words on it
评论详情: I got this shirt for my husband. It's not his style, but we like to have what we call "party shirts" that are a little out there for him to wear to holiday parties. This shirt fits the bill. He mentioned being surprised at how silky the material is -- it's surprisingly high quality. The fact that it says Velvety Jeans Couture is pretty silly, but otherwise, the design is great for parties or the club as long as you don't read too closely.

So, once again the picture doesn’t do justice!! It comes in an air tight bag. It’s so tight it looks like a cardboard shirt. When you take it out, it feels amazing, it even smells amazing! It fits perfectly. Thank you!!

评论概述: Very nice dress up shirt for special occasions but a little on the smaller size.
评论详情: The shirt is very well made, good material and the images are done quite well. No messed up patterns, everything lines up perfectly. I deducted a single star due to the sizing. I got the 4x, I usually wear 2 or 3x but have had issues recently with overseas sizes being really small. This one isn't as small, but it definitely is smaller than a 4x. The chest fits a bit snug. I would say order 2 sizes larger than you wear, maybe 3 if you like a roomy fit. Other than the size issue, everything else is spot on for a luxury shirt.

评论用户: Oxford Nordberg - Christians Only Clothing Co.
评论详情: UPDATE: After my first two times wearing it.  The look is wonderful.  I prefer brighter and outstanding colors and fashion.  This first the bill perfectly.  They are warm to wear, Love the feel of the shirt.  It didn't wrinkle up like I thought it would.  Got it dry cleaned and it lokes like new.  I'm impressed.I love the shirt and the quality of it.  I am normally a 3XL and I got a 4XL and for me it's still a little to snug for me.

评论概述: A fine, fun sort of shirt.
评论详情: I needed to do some internet searching to learn what sort of shirt this was mimicking. I don’t really know (or care much) for all of the exclusive luxury brands, but was able to find the inspiration for this. While I doubt anyone who knows their shirts is going to mistake this for that, it does have a passing resemblance to what I’ve been able to find. Definitely wouldn’t mistake this material for 100% silk, but it also was reasonable to the touch and comfortable wearing, at least over a t-shirt and I would normally wear with any button down long sleeved shirt. The shirt was actually a bit heavier than I imagined it would be. Not uncomfortably heavy to wear, it just felt a bit more substantial than I was expecting. I believe with reasonable care I’ll get enough use out of it.  With most manufactures, I would wear a size XL, tall if available. The body fit as I expected/hoped it would, although the sleeves are a bit short for me. With my arms at my sides it almost looks long enough, although if I were to move around much, the sleeves do look too short. Pretty much how many of my long sleeved shirts fit as I can’t always find shirts in tall sizes. I just roll up the sleeves a bit as if I’m really going to get to work. Still, I believe the sizing is accurate.  Perhaps my memory is a bit hazy with age, but this sort of reminds me of the shirts I wore in high school in the late 1970s. Wild colored and patterned, 100% polyester things. I got this mainly for the 70’s nights on cruise ships. I’m not going all out like some do, but I can bring along a shirt like this.  I can recommend this shirt. It’s a fine party shirt or for going to a club. Material feels nice, a bit heavier weight than expected and the artwork is crisp with vibrant colors.
Very nice silky material with vibrant colors that fits true to size. Long sleeve, button down shirt that is not too long.
Fits me perfectly!!! Excellent print quality!!! Very silky!!!
Fits and feels great looks amazing love the material XXL fits just right I’m 6’2 275lbs

评论概述: decent quality shirt for the price
评论详情: This shirt is pretty comfortable and the material is nice and soft. The stitching isn't the neatest, but it isn't immediately noticeable.

评论概述: Silk-like for sure, and somewhat nice.
评论详情: The shirt feels silky to the touch and even looks silky. It's seemingly luxurious from a slight distance but is pretty inexpensive and works well if you know what you're doing! However, it has its slight drawbacks: The designs on the shirt aren't the crispest, and you have to be pretty gentle when washing/handling this shirt. But that's about it. It's just a shirt and it looks relatively nice.

Boyfriend wore this to a wedding and everyone at our table commented on how nice his shirt was and asked where he got it. Material is breathable and we were at an outdoor wedding and my boyfriend was still able to stay cool which is a feat. He usually runs extremely hot so it's amazing that he was comfortable in this shirt the whole time.
This shirt does have a nice print, but if it's worn by a young man, he's going to get sweaty. It's mostly polyester I think so warm weather is out.
It's so well made, it looks great its comfortable and true to size, it's so high end and it was such an amazing value 5 stars and I highly recommend

Nice button down shirt and it fits great. It is just like the picture

评论概述: Overall, I am happy with this purchase.
评论详情: This is a very nice satin shirt. I listened to other reviews and bought a 3XL, although I usually wear a 1XL, it would have been quite possible to buy a 2XL. It is not worth going up more than one size compared to your US size. Overall, I am happy with this purchase.

评论概述: Soooooo nice and feels expensive and luxurious !
评论详情: This is a very nice shirt ! Absolutely stunning . Most people are familiar with this kind of print and it can look really cheap it the print is not good . Not with this one . The fabric is so nice , almost like silk , but in my opinion even better , because it is slightly thicker than silk and it has a weight to it . That makes it lay better on me . I tried the silk one , which I can not afford , this one I honestly prefer . The craftsmanship is top notch . My mom is a tailor and i know what to look at . It’s made impeccably . I can go on and on because I love this shirt . It came vacuum packaged to my surprise and was very wrinkly . I was a bit worried . But the material is so good , It didn't take much effort to iron it . You can see it in the pics . I didnt wash it yet , so I cant tell if it will hold up or not . It is such a statement piece , more to go out , party kinda shirt . I didn't have a chance to do that yet . But I know I will enjoy a lot when I can wear it . My partner was very jealous when he saw the shirt . Thank God we are not the same size , lol . For the size , I am 5.10’ 265 large overall with a belly . I thought I should go with larger size so I ordered 4XL . Just in case . But 3XL would have been a better choice . 2 XL would also work but will be a bit snuggly maybe , I prefer my shirts a bit flowy , if that makes sense . I will buy it over and over . It worth all the money they are asking for .

I am the type of person that absolutely loves these wild, loud and ridiculous type of shirts and this one was no exception. I've worn this out to several places and have always had a couple people tell me how cool it looks. Sometimes, fashion needs to be bold and this shirt definitely hits the mark. Not as hot and stuffy as you may think and very comfortable. Fits exactly as described.
Pros:  - Colors are vibrant - Could be used as a dress on a woman  Cons:  - none really.
Comfortable and very well made. Cant beat this for the price and the print pops!!

评论概述: Nice satin shirt--a bit pricey though
评论详情: This is a nice satin shirt but it runs a bit expensive.  That may not be a concern for you but it is for me and I think the price could be less for this item.The colors are vibrant and the shirt fits true to size, however.  Will be great for a vacation shirt for dinner or wearing out.  A pretty decent shirt that is comfortable to wear.

We got this for my hubby for a Halloween costume. While the shoulders fit true to size, it was a tad short on his 6'2" frame. He got lots of comments on it, mainly "are you ready for a day in Miami?" It was a hit! The material was okay, but the "Velvety Jeans Couture" (not a real company) branding was a bit much. But if this is your style, I say go for it!
Nice material.  Has a good feel to it.  Fits well.  I like the colors and patterns.

The shirt's design is stylish, and it fits well, following the body's lines without feeling too tight. More on a slim fit side. It’s nice looking, there are plenty of patterns to choose from, making it a fun addition to any wardrobe. However, the fabric feels more plasticky than silky. I was expecting a smoother texture, given that it’s advertised as “silky polyester.” While it doesn’t quite have that high-end feel, it’s lightweight and comfortable enough for daily wear or a night out. Note that it’s not very breathable, so it may feel a bit warm in hot weather. Overall, if you’re looking for a fashionable, lightweight shirt, this one is a good choice. Just don’t expect it to feel super luxurious.
Comfortable and soft. True to size and made of good quality materials.  I bought this to wear for halloween but I got a lot of compliments on this shirts. Will definitely continue to wear this.
good quality looks like Versace
Slim fit, nice style, priced comparably to the category

The fabric was much cheaper feeling than I expected and the pattern doesn’t line up well so it looks funny from the front. The comfort was okay but it fit small. I’m between an XL and an L so I ordered an XL and it was tight. I’d order at least one size larger than your usual. I won’t even wear this as a gag.

This button-down dress shirt is a beautiful shirt. Both my wife and I love it. She likes to wear it and looks divine in it. The colors are magnificent and really eye-catching. She got many compliments from her friends.

I'm 6'3" and #195. Went with a size large. Fits a bit close, but not uncomfortably. Fabric is very shiny and soft. Stitching under the arm-pits is a little jagged and uneven, but the rest is good. The buttons are hidden under a double breast lapel that gives the shirt a nice look. Sadly, the fabric design of the two front panels don't *quite* line-up which distracts a bit from the overall look.

评论概述: Definitely slim fit, even ordering oversized.
评论详情: Definitely slim fit, even ordering oversized.  Despite it saying slim fit I ordered this oversized hoping it would fit me ok. It does fit well in the sense that none of the lengths or joints are constricted, but I can't button it down. That's my bad for ordering slim fit, but I can still wear this with an undershirt and leaving the buttons open for a layered look.  It does look cool, these are cool designs printed into the shirt. The designs are placed well so they align on both sides of the buttons, very symmetrical. The construction is done well, nothing out of place and stitching is decent, a few stitches are sloppy but only you'll know because they aren't visible.  The pricing seems rather high, although it's a cool look and well executed, in the end it's just a print on polyester. I don't have the kind of cash to throw around like Armand Van Helden so the value is an important point of contention.

The fabric is very smooth and has a very intricate design. It's not something I would usually wear, but it caught my interest. It fits me pretty well based on the size chart.  The fabric doesn't feel weak, but I'd likely still hand wash it to be safe.

This shirt is ugly. But if using it for a costume, it's great. The material is strange; it almost feels like a barbershop apron and it's super thin- you can see threw it. The fit is a little small but overall it fits true to size. Recommend for a costume.

This shirt looks super sleek and fits really well, but definitely pay close attention to the size chart. Be honest with yourself when picking a size, because there's no stretch to it at all! You’ll want to get it just right for the best fit.
The fabric is thicker than expected; however it feels soft and the colors are vibrant. It looks great on and somehow it gives the appearance of an expensive fitted shirt. It is true to size

Available in a variety of colors and patterns, it’s perfect for both casual outings and formal occasions.  Comfort: Made from high-quality silk, this shirt feels incredibly soft against the skin. It resists wrinkles fairly well, which is a plus for maintaining a polished appearance.  Overall Impression: Overall, the [Brand/Model Name] men’s silk shirt is a great addition to any wardrobe. Its combination of style, comfort, and quality makes it a worthwhile investment for those looking to elevate their clothing collection. Highly recommended!
Very nice shirt but runs extremely small. I went up a size and it was still too small.

When I tell you that my husband absolutely loved this shirt, I mean it! The fabric feels incredibly smooth and luxurious against the skin, giving him a polished and sophisticated look. The eye-catching print and vibrant colors made him stand out at the event, while the tailored fit ensured he felt comfortable all night long. He appreciated the versatility of the shirt, as it can easily be dressed up or down for various occasions. Whether at a party or a formal gathering, it truly elevated his style, and he received numerous compliments throughout the evening!

This shirt is a high quality dressy shirt. The satin look and feel is great. 👍🏾 It took some time (weeks)  to receive the shirt. The shirt has a loose fit and runs a little big. I highly recommend it and love the various designs and colors. This would also make a great gift. Hopefully, you will order one and see how great the shirt is for yourself.

评论概述: Very stylish shirt. Great for costumes and nightclubs
评论详情: I get lots of compliments when wearing this shirt. The designs are all very stylish. I got multicolored110 (black and white with crown on the back). This shirt is perfect for a stylish/fancy costume. I also considered other designs for a modern game of thrones look. The shirts would also be perfect for wearing to a nightclub.  The material feels smooth and is light. Some people might say the material feels to plasticky, but I didn't have any issues with it.
Nice shirt, the material is really nice, the color is beautiful , pretty comfortable on, nice silky texture. Would highly recommend it.
The design of this shirt is fabulous and the material is silky smooth. The sizing is accurate as well.

This is a very classy shirt, perfect for a gentleman. The white is bright and mixes really well with the black. It is a shiny material. It looks and feels great in Fall type weather. It pairs well with jeans or slacks.

This shirt has a nice designer look and fit's very well.  material is pretty soft and it washed well.  For what it is and not being a true designer, i found the price a little high though personally.  But, it's a nice shirt.

Such a bright vibrant shirt. I love the nice bright blues and greens against the stark black of the shirt. This will be nice for night out to dinner. I actually think you could dress it up or down. It's comfortable and it fits well.

I like this shirt a lot. The silk feels great and looks great as well. I'm a large guy and this shirt fit me perfectly. A lot of the time shirts like this run small, but this one is actually true to size and fit me exactly as I had hoped.  The pattern is very nice looking and the shimmer that it gives off is eye catching.
Nice shirt, just not for me, cut to short and the arms are long!

Very comfortable nice fitting shirt. It looks great too.

This shirt has beautiful design and color to it. The material itself feels nice overall but there's just something about it not exactly to my nephews liking.  Other than that I think most people will find themselves please with it and it definitely has a lot of potential to be a very versatile wardrobe item

This shirt is awesome I like that the patterns line up feels great even out in the heat here in the south west. Very luxurious, i love the quality. For a tighter fit shirt it didn't accentuate my problem areas . And fit comfortably.

I ordered based on the size chart and it fits me well. The chest fits and the arms are long enough. I have a little bit of a belly and the buttons aren't tight there either. The design looks really cool. It kind of makes me feel like a Nigerian prince. I have had a strong urge to start calling random people offering them a million dollars for their vital information, but I've been able to resist thus far...I don't know how long I'll last though. The fabric is lightweight and the buttons are sewn on as most shirts, some loose threads here and there.

Whether heading to the club or just an event where you want to stand out, this is THE shirt. Vibrant colors and strong graphics ensure an eyecatching ensemble. The fabric is soft and silky. Highly recommend as a statement wardrobe piece.

My wife originally got this for me because she thought I would like it. It's nice, the material is nice as well, just not my style. So, she decided to wear it out instead. She got tons of compliments, so she kept it permanently, haha. I recommend it!
The shirt is more vibrant than shown in the pictures.  Great design.  Material could feel better.  Overall, happy with the design for the cost.
Very nice, a great value!!
Shirt made out of great material really comfortable definitely feels stylish especially if you want something that looks like Versace, but isn’t Versace made me feel like The Rock from 1996 WWE.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable Shirt for Any Occasion

The material feels lightweight and high-quality, giving it a sleek look that’s perfect for parties or special events. The fit is spot on, and it’s incredibly comfortable to wear all night long. Every time I wear it, I get compliments from friends and family. It’s a fantastic choice when you want to dress up and leave a lasting impression.

Item shipped really quickly.  It fit true to size.  We really loved the design on the shirt.  Fit well and looked great.  Overall well made except the cuffs lay slightly awkward so that is why I gave it 4 stars. Great for a night out or date night.
